sentences.sContent: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.sCn: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.sContent: English is no Esperanto, but as world languages go, it is considerably user-friendly.
sentences.sContent_eng: English is no Esperanto, but as world languages go, it is considerably user-friendly.
sentences.sCn: 英语非为世界语，但与各种世界语言相比，其相当容易掌握。

trans.tranOther: an artificial language invented in 1887 to help people from different countries in the world speak to each other
